subject: Re: [junit] Re: About Failing Tests and Stopping

On Thursday 16 September 2004 04:05, lava kafle wrote:
> Yes, the inteterst=
ing fact is that when assertions
> fail, the test stops.

Yes. Works as des=
igned.
A test runs until it fails or succeeds.
It is as simple as that.
See=
 the JUnit FAQ.
